title: Innovations Under The Oil Fields
teaser: With low oil prices, oil companies have been idling hundreds of drilling rigs. For those still active, the key is getting more out of less.
contentencoded:
With oil prices now at a six year low, oil companies have been idling hundreds of drilling rigs. For the wells that remain active, the key is getting more out of less. From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Leigh Paterson of Inside Energy reports on how these producers are using new technologies to chase oil thousands of feet below the earth’s surface
